casebody.data:
VIETOR et al., Respondents, v. NICHOL et al., Appellants. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

April 28, 1897.) Action by George F. Vietor and another against George T. Nichol and others. Campbell & Murphy, for appellants. Blumenstiel & Hirsch, for respondents. PER CURIAM.

We .think that the trial justice was right in directing a verdict in the favor of the plaintiffs, because the defendants’ evidence presented no defense. Judgment affirmed, with costs.
